description: This file is an ESLint configuration module written in JavaScript, using ES Module syntax. It imports necessary modules, sets up compatibility extensions for ESLint configurations, and exports an ESLint configuration array.

methods.name: dirname
methods.description: Returns the directory name of a path.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a file URL to a path string.

methods.name: compat.extends
methods.description: Method to extend ESLint configurations, used to include predefined config sets.
